{"blocks":[{"key":"1d1lp","text":"Aspirate culture medium from well/plate that should be dissociated and wash with PBS 1X.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhpl6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c40io","text":"Transfer to   incubator for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cj8g5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1vni","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fbue7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":135,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"408h0","text":"The time can vary by cell line and density (the optimal density is 70-90%) and the goal to use accutase is singularize as single cells.","type":"unstyled"}],"duration":480,"entityMap":{},"error_temperature":false,"guid":"96BA2616838911ECA0DE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"96BA2470838911ECA0DE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":135,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"408h0","text":"The time can vary by cell line and density (the optimal density is 70-90%) and the goal to use accutase is singularize as single cells.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mkuk","text":"Meanwhile aspirate Matrigel from well and add   culture medium E8 supplemented with CEPT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25tth","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"D35FA190838D11ECB510E1A27A0F3011","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nshg","text":"When Incubation is ready, tilt the plate and pipet the accutase solution two to three times up and down the culture surface to break the colonies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1adr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ltnq","text":"Quench the Accutase adding half of the culture volume of PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iroj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1b8fi","text":"Transfer to a new conical tube and rinse with more PBS the culture surface, combine with the cell solution in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mi4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60t9o","text":"Count cells and plate 1 - 1.5 x 106  cells into a Matrigel-coated well. Gently swirl plate to evenly distribute cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":28},{"style":"sup","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i31f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
